item.description:
Hello Everyone -

Let's try this again.  The weather called for rain last Sunday, where it was raining but ended up clearing up.  50/50 call at 8 o'clock in the morning.

So anyway Let's Go Kayaking!!. We're gonna stick with Nantasket Beach area in Hull on the Weir River. Easy to find, plenty of parking!!! It's a quite 3 or so hour paddle, great for beginners and beyond and we'll take a break and stop for a snack/lunch.  The $35 fee includes kayak and equipment rentals for the trip.

Please bring:

  • a snack/lunch
  • plenty of water
  • sunscreen
  • a hat
  • No alcohol
  • a smile for a good time 
  • Bringing your own boat:  No cost, need your own PFD, paddle and whistle
  • ﻿

WEATHER :

Check your email Saturday Night/Sunday morning for cancellation notice from me. Event will be cancelled due to bad weather.

*SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to kayaks and/or kayak equipment. Personal flotation devices (PFDs) are required for all participants.

Directions -url=http://www.nantasketkayaks.com/location.php

the Marina is across from the Nantasket Carrousel

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Let's Go Kayaking!!!
